text: Harry Thomas Edwards (born November 3, 1940), an American politician, lawyer and legal scholar. He is a Senior United States Circuit Judge and chief judge emeritus of the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit in Washington, D.C..Federal Judicial Center, Biographical Directory of Article III Federal Judges, 1789-present; United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit, Judge Harry T. Edwards . In 1980, he was nominated to the court by President Jimmy Carter. He is a professor of law at the New York University School of Law.NYU School of Law Faculty Profile: Harry T. Edwards. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:American judges Category:Lawyers from Washington, D.C. title: Harry T. Edwards
